actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: To amend the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to provide for a House of Representatives election limitation on contributions from persons other than local individual residents.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to limit House of Representatives election contributions from persons other than local individual residents.

titles.title: To amend the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to provide for a House of Representatives election limitation on contributions from persons other than local individual residents.
